summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.8 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 228 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1810 m), feels like temperature (up 2.8°C), outside temperature (up 2.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 227.7m lower than yesterday, 756.4m lower than the past week, 1810.4m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 839.2m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1595.7m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, humidity should not be a concern and very little to no wind will be present. Some rain can be expected, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and the light is absent. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
